name: Failure Journal | Notion Template
description: There’s surprising power in recording all the ways you screwed up!Why did I create this?A lot is said about success in social media and the modern digital world. But there is a B-side that is talked about less. Failure.If you want your life to change, you must fail more, not less. And when you reflect on your failures, regularly, you’ll begin to see them for what they are: life lessons.Using the Failure Jornal, you can now:Get a clearer picture of what works in your life and what does not. You w
features: What is the “failure” in this situation?; What caused the failure?; What would “success” have looked like?; What is the lesson in this failure?; People searching for a digital journal or agenda.; Goal-oriented people; People building a personal growth toolbox to be a better person.
